Subject:- 
Airport  Operator  Security Programme 
 
In partial modification of  this  Bureau  Circular  no. 12/2006 dated 
26.7.2006 on the  subject cited above,  the following  paragraph  shall be  
added  after  the  last  sentence of   paragraph no. 4 : 
 
The Airport Operator concerned shall ensure that all aircraft 
operators and other relevant stakeholders have copies of relevant 
portions of ASPs.
